name: webAI
oneline_brief: AI for enterprises to run models locally, emphasizing data privacy and scalability.
description: Empowers businesses to harness the power of AI on their own devices, reducing cloud dependency while ensuring data security and real-time insights.

name: Suno
oneline_brief: Users create original music via AI using text or musical prompts.
description: Allows creation of custom, royalty-free music with deep learning and music theory integration.

name: Blossom

description: Blossom builds AI agents for mental healthcareâ€”copilots for psychiatry and clinical use cases.

name: Icon

description: AI platform to help brands create engaging ecommerce advertising campaigns with real creators.

name: Avoca
oneline_brief: Automating jobs for service businesses via AI.
description: Avoca builds AI-powered workforces for hospitality, retail, logistics, and service businesses.

name: Flyfin
tagline: AI-powered tax prep & filing for self-employed
oneline_brief: Automated CPAs and tax filing for freelancers and creators.
description: Flyfin is an AI-powered tax prep platform built specifically for freelancers, creators, and gig workers, combining AI and real CPAs for seamless filing.

name: Coppell
oneline_brief: Insurance brokerage and guidance, rebuilt with AI agents.
description: Coppell uses AI to coach SMBs and individuals to better compare, select, and optimize insurance coverage, reducing time and paperwork.

name: Polymath Robotics
oneline_brief: Turning any industrial vehicle into self-driving machines.
description: Polymath Robotics provides plug-and-play autonomy kits for tractors, forklifts & mining vehicles.

name: FlowGPT
tagline: Prompt sharing and discovery for AI enthusiasts
oneline_brief: The largest library of AI prompts for ChatGPT and other tools.
description: FlowGPT lets users create, share, discover, and optimize AI prompts for productivity, creativity, and learning.

name: Glide
tagline: Build apps from your data and AI
oneline_brief: No-code platform for creating custom software powered by AI.
description: Glide turns spreadsheets into beautiful apps, merging data sources, automations, and AI features.

name: AssemblyAI
oneline_brief: State-of-the-art speech recognition APIs for transcription and analysis.
description: AssemblyAI offers APIs for audio transcription, sentiment analysis, conversation intelligence, and more for media and enterprise.

name: Mistral AI
tagline: Open-source generative AI models for Europe
oneline_brief: Developing advanced, open, European AI foundation models.
description: Mistral AI is creating state-of-the-art open-source foundation models, driving innovation and independence for European enterprises.

name: Unkey

name: Luma AI
oneline_brief: Turn phone videos into photorealistic 3D assets.
description: Luma AI lets anyone create 3D models from smartphones for gaming, e-commerce, and mixed reality, with world-class generative AI.

name: Adept AI
oneline_brief: Automating web tasks & workflows with AI agents.
description: Adept AI builds large scale, general-purpose platform agents to automate complex tasks using any software interface.

name: Glean
oneline_brief: Bringing generative AI to enterprise search.
description: Glean uses AI to connect, unify, and find knowledge across all company apps in one search experience.

name: Character.AI
oneline_brief: Build custom AI personalities for entertainment, productivity, and education.
description: Character.AI lets users create chatbots and virtual AI friends, learning and adapting to user input for entertainment and knowledge.

name: Inflection AI
oneline_brief: Advanced AI agents for personal and professional life.
description: Personal and business AI assistant platform founded by ex-DeepMind and LinkedIn engineers.

name: Sakana AI

description: Sakana AI builds advanced, efficient generative models for enterprise applications, highly tuned for Asia-Pacific languages and data.

name: Hume AI
oneline_brief: Emotion, voice, and sentiment recognition for apps and research.
description: Hume builds emotion AI APIs for interpreting and generating nuanced human speech and reactions.

description: Perplexity AI provides precise answers with citations using advanced language models, redefining how people search for information.

description: Harvey AI assists lawyers with research, drafting, analysis, and workflow automation using domain-specific AI models.

description: ElevenLabs creates high-quality text-to-speech and voice cloning technology for media, gaming, and accessibility.

description: Jasper AI helps marketing teams create high-quality content faster with AI-powered writing and image generation.

oneline_brief: High-quality training data for AI models.

name: Figma

name: Notion
oneline_brief: Write, plan, collaborate, and organize everything.
description: Notion combines notes, docs, wikis, and project management into a unified workspace with AI features.

name: Anduril Industries
oneline_brief: AI-powered defense systems and autonomous vehicles.
description: Anduril builds advanced defense technology including autonomous drones, sensors, and counter-systems using AI.

name: Ramp
oneline_brief: Save time and money with automated expense management.
description: Ramp provides corporate cards, expense management, and bill payments with AI-powered insights to help businesses control spending.

name: Chime
oneline_brief: Fee-free banking with early direct deposit.
description: Chime offers mobile-first banking with no hidden fees, automatic savings, and credit-building tools.

name: Plaid
oneline_brief: Connect users' bank accounts to apps securely.
description: Plaid enables fintech apps to connect with users' bank accounts for payments, verification, and financial data.

name: Stripe
oneline_brief: Financial infrastructure for the internet.
description: Stripe provides payment processing, billing, and financial tools for businesses of all sizes to accept payments online.

name: Brex
oneline_brief: Corporate cards, banking, and spend management for startups.
description: Brex offers corporate cards with high limits, cash management accounts, and expense software for growing companies.

name: Navan
oneline_brief: Corporate travel booking and expense management.
description: Navan (formerly TripActions) combines travel booking, expense management, and corporate cards in one platform.

name: Carta
oneline_brief: Cap table management and equity administration.
description: Carta helps private companies, investors, and employees manage equity, valuations, and cap tables digitally.

name: Databricks
oneline_brief: Lakehouse platform for data, analytics, and AI.
description: Databricks provides a unified platform for data engineering, data science, and machine learning on the cloud.

description: Snowflake provides a cloud-based data warehousing platform for analytics, data engineering, and AI applications.

name: Anthropic

description: Anthropic develops advanced AI systems like Claude, focusing on safety, alignment, and responsible AI deployment.

name: Relativity Space
oneline_brief: First company to 3D print entire rockets.
description: Relativity Space uses autonomous robotics and 3D printing to build rockets faster and cheaper for satellite launches.

name: Airtable
oneline_brief: Low-code platform for building custom workflows.
description: Airtable combines spreadsheet simplicity with database power, enabling teams to build custom apps and workflows.

name: Instacart
tagline: Groceries delivered in as fast as 1 hour
oneline_brief: Online grocery delivery and pickup service.
description: Instacart partners with local stores to deliver groceries to customers' doors, powered by a gig economy workforce.

name: Devoted Health
oneline_brief: Technology-driven health insurance for seniors.
description: Devoted Health combines insurance with clinical care to improve outcomes and reduce costs for Medicare beneficiaries.

name: Tempus
oneline_brief: Using data and AI to personalize cancer treatment.
description: Tempus collects and analyzes clinical and molecular data to help doctors personalize cancer care and improve outcomes.

name: Olive AI
oneline_brief: Automating healthcare's most repetitive tasks.
description: Olive AI uses artificial intelligence to automate administrative processes in hospitals and health systems.

name: Rubrik
oneline_brief: Data security and management for hybrid cloud.
description: Rubrik provides cloud-native data protection, backup, recovery, and ransomware defense for enterprises.

name: Wiz
oneline_brief: Complete security for cloud infrastructure.
description: Wiz provides unified cloud security covering vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, secrets, and threats across multi-cloud environments.

name: Lacework
oneline_brief: Data-driven cloud security platform.
description: Lacework automates cloud security at scale, providing threat detection, compliance, and vulnerability management.

name: Snyk
oneline_brief: Find and fix vulnerabilities in code.
description: Snyk helps developers find and automatically fix security vulnerabilities in code, dependencies, containers, and infrastructure.

name: GitLab
oneline_brief: Complete DevOps platform in a single application.
description: GitLab provides version control, CI/CD, security, and collaboration tools for software development teams.

name: HashiCorp
oneline_brief: Multi-cloud infrastructure automation software.
description: HashiCorp provides tools like Terraform, Vault, and Consul for provisioning, securing, and managing cloud infrastructure.

name: Temporal
oneline_brief: Build invincible applications with workflow orchestration.
description: Temporal provides an open-source platform for orchestrating complex, long-running workflows and microservices.

name: Hugging Face
tagline: The AI community building the future
oneline_brief: Platform for sharing and collaborating on machine learning models.
description: Hugging Face hosts the largest repository of open-source AI models and datasets, empowering developers and researchers.

name: Webflow
oneline_brief: No-code website builder for designers and developers.
description: Webflow enables designers to build responsive websites visually while generating clean, semantic code automatically.

name: Miro
oneline_brief: Collaborative online whiteboard platform.
description: Miro provides an infinite canvas for teams to brainstorm, plan, and collaborate visually in real-time.

name: Monday.com
oneline_brief: Project management and workflow platform.
description: Monday.com provides customizable workflows and project management tools to help teams collaborate and track work.

name: Confluent
oneline_brief: Set data in motion with Apache Kafka.
description: Confluent provides a cloud-native platform for real-time data streaming built on Apache Kafka.

name: Kong
oneline_brief: Manage, monitor, and secure APIs and microservices.
description: Kong provides an API gateway and service mesh for managing microservices and APIs in cloud-native environments.

name: Prefect
oneline_brief: Build, run, and monitor data pipelines at scale.
description: Prefect provides workflow orchestration for data engineering teams to build reliable data pipelines with Python.

name: Airbyte
oneline_brief: Move data from any source to any destination.
description: Airbyte provides open-source ELT pipelines for syncing data from applications, APIs, and databases to warehouses.

name: dbt Labs
oneline_brief: Analytics engineering platform for data teams.
description: dbt enables data analysts and engineers to transform data in their warehouse more effectively using software engineering practices.

name: Weights & Biases
oneline_brief: Track, visualize, and optimize machine learning experiments.
description: Weights & Biases provides tools for experiment tracking, model management, and collaboration for ML teams.

name: Abnormal Security
oneline_brief: Stop socially-engineered email attacks.
description: Abnormal Security uses behavioral AI to detect and prevent sophisticated email attacks like phishing and account compromise.
